Piglet Template Engine======================piglet-templates is a text and HTML templating engine in the genshi/kajikitemplates family.The Piglet template engine offers:- Template inhertitance through / (similar to Jinja2)- Compiles templates to fast python byte code.- HTML templating: templates produce well formed HTML. Template variables are autoescaped to protect against XSS attacks.- Reusable template functions.- Good i18n support.- Clear tracebacks from exceptions raised in templates.`Piglet Template Engine Documentation `_\| `Repository `_Example piglet template:.. code:: html

This is the content block.

Hello $user.firstnames $user.lastname!

$line

There's a text templating mode too:.. code:: Hello $user.firstnames $user.lastname! {% for verse in poem %} {% for line in verse %}$line {% end %} {% end %}License-------Piglet-templates is licensed under the Apache license version 2.0.Piglet-templates is developed by`Olly Cope `_and was created for `skot.be `_
